Package org.codehaus.commons.compiler.util.reflect

Class Classes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.codehaus.commons.compiler.util.reflect.Classes
  • public final class Classes
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods related to Class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.reflect.Method getDeclaredMethod​(java.lang.Class<?> declaringClass, java.lang.String methodName, java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
      A wrapper for declaringClass.getDeclaredMethod(methodName, parameterTypes) that catches any exception, wraps it in an AssertionError, and throws that.
      static java.lang.Class<?> load​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.lang.String className)
      A wrapper for classLoader.loadClass(className) that catches any exception, wraps it in an AssertionError, and throws that.
      static java.lang.Class<?> load​(java.lang.String className)
      Shorthand for load(ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader(), className).
